meanings.definition: Modify (something) to suit a particular individual or task.
meanings.sent1: She customised her phone case with stickers to make it unique.
meanings.sent2: The tailor customised the dress to fit perfectly.
meanings.sent3: He customised his lunch by adding extra cheese to his sandwich.
meanings.sent4: The artist customised the painting with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The chef customised the recipe by adding a special spice blend.

meanings.definition: Made or done to order; custom-made.
meanings.sent1: She ordered a customised necklace with her initials engraved on it.
meanings.sent2: The customised furniture in the living room matched the curtains perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The customised cake for the party was shaped like a unicorn.
meanings.sent4: The customised car had a sleek design and unique features.
meanings.sent5: The customised gift box was filled with handpicked items.

meanings.definition: Adapted or tailored to meet individual needs or preferences.
meanings.sent1: The customised training program helped each employee improve their skills.
meanings.sent2: Her customised schedule allowed her to balance work and family time.
meanings.sent3: The customised playlist for the road trip had all their favorite songs.
meanings.sent4: The customised workout plan was designed to target specific muscle groups.
meanings.sent5: The customised menu at the restaurant catered to various dietary restrictions.
